ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1613 â€“ Food Additives)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1613 - Food Additive) in order to add the citric acid esters of mono- and di-glycerides as a food additive in infant formula for special medical purposes and in those foods that are currently permitted to contain monoglyceride citrate, such as fats, oils, shortening, and margarine.
